file_insights.key_discovery: Uses useRef for tracking loading state transitions to prevent unnecessary toast renders
Added toast.success() for filter reset functionality
Added toast verification tests with sonner mock

patterns_discovered: useRef for detecting state transitions without spamming re-renders
Conditional toast rendering based on meaningful state changes
Mocking toast library in component tests
gotchas_discovered: Need to track previous loading state to show toasts only on meaningful transitions
Prevent toast spam on unnecessary re-renders
Ensure toast tests cover different scenarios

approach_outcome.key_achievement: Successfully added toast notifications for filter reset, API errors, and data loading

recommendations: Run full npm test to verify automated test coverage
Consider adding more granular toast messages for different scenarios
